title: Chicken, avocado and alfalfa club sandwich
ingredients: ['1½ tbsp lime juice', '1 tsp olive oil', '½ red onion, very thinly sliced', '1 small avocado', 'dash of Tabasco or chilli sauce', '2 tbsp reduced-fat mayonnaise', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '6 medium slices Granary bread', '175g cooked, skinless chicken breast fillet, sliced', '2 tomatoes, thinly sliced', '25g alfalfa sprouts']
